name: Amagami ebKore+
overview: Christmas is the protagonist's least favorite holiday in the year, but this this time, he's trying to change things, he decides to spend the holiday with the girl of his dreams. Filled to the brim with pretty characters, carefully drawn illustrations and story events, Amagami is now available as an Ebkore+ edition. The game system is upgraded with more choices, story clips and mini games. Those who are not exactly good with mahjong can now let the game handle it for them, while they focus on getting the routes and endings they want.
